pkgmetadata.longdescription: Break Down Plots // Break Down Plots are inspired by waterfall plots created by 'xgboostExplainer' package (see https://github .com/AppliedDataSciencePartners/xgboostExplainer). The idea behind Break Down Plots it to decompose model prediction for a single observation. Break Down Plots show the contribution of every variable present in the model. Such plots will work for binary classifiers and general regression models.
